Question
========
  
Which of the following conclusion(s) is/are justified based on a hypothesis test in which the effect of an intervention is not statistically significant?

  
Answerlist
----------
* The test shows that the intervention has no effect.
* The test shows that the alternative hypothesis is false.
* The test did not provide convincing evidence that the intervention has an effect.
* Answers a, b and c are all correct conclusions.

Solution
========


Answerlist

* This is not the correct conclusion.

* This is the correct conclusion.
* Not all conclusions are correct.
